TITLE: Updating Tailwind v3 to v4 Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Diff showing the necessary changes to update from Tailwind v3 to v4, including dependency and configuration updates.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/tailwind/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: diff
CODE:
```
defp deps do
  [
-    {:tailwind, "~> 0.2", runtime: Mix.env() == :dev},
+    {:tailwind, "~> 0.3", runtime: Mix.env() == :dev},
  ]
end
```

LANGUAGE: diff
CODE:
```
config :tailwind,
-   version: "3.4.13",
+   version: "4.0.9",
    default: [
      args: ~w(
-       --config=tailwind.config.js
-       --input=css/app.css
-       --output=../priv/static/assets/app.css
+       --input=assets/css/app.css
+       --output=priv/static/assets/app.css
     ),
-    cd: Path.expand("../assets", __DIR__)
+    cd: Path.expand("..", __DIR__)
  ]
```

LANGUAGE: diff
CODE:
```
-@import "tailwindcss/base";
-@import "tailwindcss/components";
-@import "tailwindcss/utilities";
+@import "tailwindcss";
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Tailwind Dependencies in Elixir
DESCRIPTION: Configuration for adding Tailwind as a dependency in mix.exs for production builds. Sets runtime condition to only run in dev environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/tailwind/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
def deps do
  [
    {:tailwind, "~> 0.3", runtime: Mix.env() == :dev}
  ]
end
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Tailwind Profile
DESCRIPTION: Example configuration for Tailwind profile including input/output paths and working directory settings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/tailwind/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
config :tailwind,
  version: "4.0.9",
  default: [
    args: ~w(
      --input=assets/css/app.css
      --output=priv/static/assets/app.css
    ),
    cd: Path.expand("..", __DIR__)
  ]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Tailwind CLI
DESCRIPTION: Command line instructions for installing Tailwind using Mix tasks, including alternative installation for unsupported platforms.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/tailwind/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ mix tailwind.install
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ mix tailwind.install https://people.freebsd.org/~dch/pub/tailwind/v3.2.6/tailwindcss-freebsd-x64
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Phoenix Dependencies with Tailwind
DESCRIPTION: Mix dependencies configuration showing both Phoenix and Tailwind integration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/tailwind/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
def deps do
  [
    {:phoenix, "~> 1.7"},
    {:tailwind, "~> 0.3", runtime: Mix.env() == :dev}
  ]
end
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Tailwind as Dev Dependency
DESCRIPTION: Alternative dependency configuration for when assets are precompiled during development, limiting Tailwind to dev environment only.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/tailwind/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
def deps do
  [
    {:tailwind, "~> 0.3", only: :dev}
  ]
end
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Tailwind Version
DESCRIPTION: Basic configuration in config/config.exs to specify the Tailwind version to use.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/tailwind/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
config :tailwind, version: "4.0.9"
```
